desc: Tooltips provide hints to the player for both gameplay information and story progression.
Dynamic checkpoints allow paths to be blocked until the player has met some gameplay criteria.
NPCs (non-player characters) can be interacted with on the map to advance the story.
NPC responses are AI driven and the images are AI rendered.
NPC dialogues sometimes include Ability Checks, a dice roll based on character stats, to determine outcomes.
Unfriendly NPCs might require combat to get passed, especially if an Ability Check was failed.
